articles.description: Stanley just dropped bold new colors of its shopper-loved tumblers ahead of the holiday season. Find electric yellow, two-tone blue, Kelly green, and more on the 20- and 40-ounce FlowState Quencher, AeroLight Transit Bottle, and 10-ounce mug.
articles.content: Were about to enter gifting season, which can be a puzzling experiment of how well you know your friends, family, or coworkers. But one thing thats always certain is no matter who youre buying for, t… [+3827 chars]
